thread.section_title: Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Conference
thread.title_full: Conference - Review of Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: TPatrickUg
title: Conference
text:
Though the place has many facilities and activities to offer for different type of people. I attended a conference last week and found it to be one of the best place for conferences / meetings in Kampala.
The place is huge however they offer electric golf carts to pick & drop participants from their rooms to the conference area, dining areas as well as to the venues where you may be attending an event in the evenings.
The rooms are of good standards and well maintained. The services are good.
Overall the place is really huge and nice for anyone to have meetings & seminars as well as suitable place for individual travelers and families.
